message: Let's start fair. I'll take the majority, but you get a decent share.  What do you say?
I'm trying to be fair, but I want a slightly better deal this time. Your turn!
Let's compromise. I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I need more than 60 to make this worthwhile. What do you think?
I'm still trying to find a balance. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not willing to give up too much. Your turn again!
